name: Book of Crab
description:
Book of Crab

“Book of Crab” is a stealth game where you have to gather animals and sacrifice them in a specific order to perform a demonic ritual, so you can make your wish come true with the help of the devil. You have to dodge the alerted villagers so they don’t hinder you in performing your ritual.

Technical Details
  • The game was made in Unity
  • All sounds and graphics were made by ourselves
